Name: DUMB: Treasure
About the game: Use a remote-controlled robot to find the treasure lost under the bed. It is a powerful forgotten artifact capable of defeating monsters. It shouldn't be too hard... It's hidden in plain sight. Some people just never bothered to find it. Who knows... This short mission can change your life forever. For once this would be a positive change... DUMB: Treasure is a short point & click game that takes between 15-20 minutes to complete. Game Features [Unique Gameplay] Become the operator of a remotely controlled robot and wander through Â the cardboard maze under the bed. [Unsettling World] The graphics were based on carefully prepared photos. Everything looks as if it was happening in reality, which makes the horror scenes ever scarier. [Rich Universe] This game is part of a larger series called Darkness Under My Bed. All titles are linked together and form one coherent story.
